dict.key: Very loud noises can make people ill
dict.string: 非常大的噪音会让人得病
dict.key: My friend is a middle school student
dict.string: 我的朋友是一名中学生
dict.key: The man with black glasses liked sweet food
dict.string: 戴墨镜的那个人喜欢吃甜食
dict.key: Dick lived in the country a few years ago
He took his bag and left
Li Lei always helps me when I have difficulties
dict.string: 当我遇到困难时，李雷总能给我帮助。
